title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 317.16 - Merger
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 317.16 - Merger

State Regulations

With the approval of the chair, two or more group
self-insurers may merge into one of the constituent groups. The group
self-insurer resulting from the merger of two or more group self-insurers shall
assume, in full, all liabilities and obligations of the constituent
groups. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
317.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
